title: The FOMC Meeting And Its Impact On Markets
itunes:title: The FOMC Meeting And Its Impact On Markets
description:
Katerina Simonetti, Senior Vice President at Morgan Stanley, talks about December’s FOMC meeting, inflation, and gives her 2022 economic outlook. Sam Sidhu, President and CEO of Customers Bank, discusses consumer outlook, markets, and the FOMC meeting. Brian Smoluch, CIO of Hood River Capital Management, talks about Fed tapering and inflation. Dan Genter, CEO, CIO, and Chairman of RNC Genter Capital Management, discusses tapering and investment strategies. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
